name: Brask
appearance: Broad-shouldered, salt-gray mustache, lacquered breastplate over a broker’s coat; hands stained with ink and tar.
character: Officious yet pragmatic; keeps the docks moving by any means that won’t sink tomorrow.
talents: turning rival patrols against each other
reading foot-dusted floors for traffic patterns
dreams: retire quietly to an inland arbitration seat
buy a permanent Board of Tallymen vote
restore the Saltwardens’ image as neutral peacekeepers
secrets: took hush-money tied to sabotage at Dry Dock Three
keeps a copied key to a Brine Exchange vault with counterfeit chits
bribed a Mnemos clerk to bury a recall of oath-leeches use
